title: Oat chocolate chip cookies
ingredients: ['160g oats', '100g wholemeal flour', '2 tablespoons milled flaxseed', '2 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '225ml honey', '2 egg whites', '4 teaspoons almond butter', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '100g dark chocolate chips or dried cranberries (optional)']
